CustomField.description: wd field indicates if a response is active in the funnel or not.
CustomField.formula:
IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Referred to Partner" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Convert to Prospect" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Convert to Contact" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - No Action Required" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Merged" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Unqualified" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Recycled" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Already Engaged" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Unmapped" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Lost" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Won" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Unmapped" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Customer" ), ISPICKVAL(FCR_Response_Status__c, "Not a Response")),"Not Active in Funnel" ,
IF( Neg__c = TRUE, "9. Neg", IF( VOC__c = TRUE, "8. VOC", IF( Prop__c = TRUE, "7. Prop", IF( Demo__c, "6. Demo", IF( FCR_SQR__c = TRUE, "5. Opp", IF( FCRM_FCR_SAL__c = TRUE, "4. SAL", IF( FCR_SAR__c = TRUE, "3. SQL", IF( FCR_QR__c = TRUE, "2. MQL", IF( FCR_Inquiry_Target__c = TRUE, "1. Inquiry", "") )))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: indicates if a response is active in the funnel or not.
CustomField.label: Current Stage in Funnel
